poemsDataJson.list_full: 白露(しらつゆ)に 風(かぜ)の吹(ふ)きしく 秋(あき)の野(の)は つらぬきとめぬ 玉(たま)ぞ散(ち)りける
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: In the autumn fields//When the heedless wind blows by//Over the pure-white dew,//How the myriad unstrung gems//Are scattered everywhere around
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Shira-tsuyu ni|Kaze no fukishiku|Aki no no wa|Tsuranuki tomenu|Tama zo chiri keru
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: つらぬきとめぬ たまそちりける
poemsDataJson.author: 文屋朝康(ふんやのあさやす)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 秋の野の風に散り乱れる白露の美しさ
